sentences: Varsti kadusid silmapiirilt allapidi pööratud tippudega mäed.
Mereäärne linn kadusid uue sadama ehitamisel.
context: The word 'kadusid' is the past tense plural form of the verb 'kada' (to disappear, to vanish). It describes multiple things that disappeared or were lost in the past. In the example sentence from H. Sergo, it refers to mountains disappearing below the horizon when turned upside down.
